alert.note: Alert for Eastern Hampden; Eastern Hampshire (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Tolland, northeastern Hartford, southeastern Hampshire and southeastern Hampden Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 628 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Enfield, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Little to no impact from hail is expected. Locations impacted include... Springfield, Hartford, West Hartford, Manchester, Chicopee, East Hartford, Enfield, Westfield, Holyoke, Glastonbury, Vernon, Windsor, Agawam, West Springfield, Wethersfield, Mansfield, South Windsor, Ludlow, Bloomfield and South Hadley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for northern Connecticut...and western Massachusetts. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch also remains in effect until 1100 PM EDT for northern Connecticut.
